title: Manage Press Box on Game Day
description: A team's media relations coordinator needs to manage the press box during a game, providing stats and information to journalists.

tasks.description: Distribute game notes and starting lineups to all credentialed media before the game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully provides all media with the necessary information.

tasks.description: During the game, provide real-time statistics and injury updates to the media.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent continuously provides updates as they happen.

tasks.description: After the game, arrange and facilitate post-game interviews with players and coaches.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully coordinates the post-game press conferences.
